intro: Thesium tauricola, commonly known as the Crimean thesium, is a flowering plant species native to the Crimean Peninsula. Thesium tauricola is adapted to dry, sandy soils and is often found in open habitats such as dunes and coastal areas. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
